job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van web-applicaties op verschillende manieren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to building web applications, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: funger als senior door zowel zelf te coderen als het team te coachen op technische aspecten.
job_tasks.justification: Coding and coaching on technical aspects are fundamental to software development roles, especially senior ones.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van end-to-end webapplicaties met behulp van Python en Django.
job_tasks.justification: This specifies the development of complete web applications using specific technologies, clearly falling under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Het schrijven van efficiënte, onderhoudsvriendelijke en schaalbare code voor verschillende applicaties van het platform behoren tot je takenpakket;
job_tasks.justification: Writing code with specific qualities (efficient, maintainable, scalable) for applications is a direct software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: werk je nauw samen met data scientist en data engineers om LLM's te integreren
job_tasks.justification: Integrating LLMs falls under the broader umbrella of working with models, particularly generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: werk je nauw samen met data scientist en data engineers
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with data engineers indicates involvement in data-related processes, even if not directly performing data engineering.
Mentioning 'data engineers' implies interaction with data pipelines and infrastructure, aligning with data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Werk je nauw samen met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen, technische oplossingen te adviseren en hoogwaardige softwareproducten op tijd en binnen het budget te leveren.
job_tasks.justification: Understanding stakeholder needs, advising on technical solutions, and delivering products within constraints are key aspects of business understanding and project management.
Advising on technical solutions is part of the software development lifecycle, bridging business needs and technical implementation.
Code reviews are a standard practice in software development and operations to ensure quality and adherence to standards, which can be considered an MLOps-related activity.

job_tasks.phrase: het geven van constructieve feedback om onze 'coding standards' en 'best practices' te blijven hanteren
job_tasks.justification: Providing feedback on coding standards and best practices is integral to maintaining the quality and efficiency of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM
job_tasks.justification: Staying updated on GenAI and LLMs directly relates to the knowledge required for modeling tasks in this domain.

job_tasks.phrase: softwareontwikkeling zodat je instaat bent om met nieuwe inzichten en aanbevelingen te komen ter optimalisatie van onze producten
job_tasks.justification: While also software development, the context of 'new insights and recommendations for product optimization' in relation to GenAI/LLMs suggests a modeling enhancement aspect.

soft_skills.phrase: funger als senior door zowel zelf te coderen als het team te coachen op technische aspecten
werk je nauw samen met data scientist en data engineers
begeleid je junior developers, deel je jouw kennis en ervaring
Werk je nauw samen met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen
Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM en softwareontwikkeling
nieuwe inzichten en aanbevelingen te komen ter optimalisatie van onze producten

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes the development of web applications around GenAI and LLMs, requiring integration of these models and staying updated on their advancements. While software development is a strong component, the core focus on applying LLMs and GenAI technologies points towards the GenAI Engineer profile.
